europeana:record.dc:title: Aphids of Java. Part II: Sinomegoura Takahashi, 1960 (Homoptera: Aphididae), with a new species from Coffea*
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Noordam D.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Aphididae; Sinomegoura; taxonomy; key; Coffea; Java
europeana:record.dc:description: A description is given of Sinomegoura. The following three species were collected in Java: Sinomegoura citricola (Van der Goot, 1917), from various woody plants; Sinomegoura symplocois (Van der Goot, 1917), collected by Van der Goot from Symplocos and described by him as Aulacorthum symplocois Van der Goot, 1917; and a new species collected from leaves of Coffea sp., Sinomegoura coffeae spec. nov. Keys are given to the apterae and alatae viviparae, and the species are described.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Aphids of Java. Part II: Sinomegoura Takahashi, 1960 (Homoptera: Aphididae), with a new species from Coffea* (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 60) (Issue 3)
